title: People Watching
lyrics:
My momma told me
If you find some fame
Don't start the cocaine
Yeah, yeah, now

But we could always

Find some mindless ways

To keep entertained



Yeah, yeah

We've got something



Don't take much to have some fun

Grab your shades and we'll do some

People watching



Keep all your designer drugs

I just wanna smoke your love

We've got something, people watching us



Momma told me

If she consumes your mind

Hold on for dear life



Yeah, yeah, woo



Don't need an island

Or a private plane

To bet to these days



Yeah, yeah



We've got something

Don't take much to have some fun

Grab your shades and we'll do some

People watching



Keep all your designer drugs

I just wanna smoke your love

We've got something people watching us



Play, play, play, the champagne

While we lay a Sunday

Strangers living out their lives



Place your bets on all them

And I can search to no end



You could say, you could say it's all in your hands



We've got something

Don't take much to have some fun

Grab your shades and we'll do some

People watching



Keep all your designer drugs

I just wanna smoke your love

We've got something

People watching us



Don't take much to have some fun

Grab your shades and we'll do some

People watching



Keep all your designer drugs

I just wanna smoke your love

We've got something

People watching us
